column4: ax3: rm -rf *.mp3. But I would be very careful to play around with rm recursivly...
/ zcat[1] : ok thanks will give it a try
lmao mwe thank you as well hahaha
note that this will delete files recursivly, i.e. in all sub-directories as well. Try locate *.mp3 first, that should give you a list on what you're about to remove.
